ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of SHANNON B. MASON of Victoria County, in the Province of Nova Scotia, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
